metadata.description: Agent skills for product strategy, UX design, marketing, sales, motivation, and conversion optimization

plugins.name: product-strategy
plugins.description: Product strategy and innovation frameworks including Jobs to Be Done (Clayton Christensen) for customer discovery and product design, plus tactical negotiation skills (Chris Voss)

plugins.name: ux-design
plugins.description: UX and UI design skills including Refactoring UI, iOS HIG design, usability heuristics, habit-forming product design, web typography, award-winning top-design, and Don Norman's foundational design principles

plugins.name: marketing-cro
plugins.description: Marketing and conversion optimization skills including CRO methodology, StoryBrand messaging, and Scorecard Marketing lead generation

plugins.name: sales-influence
plugins.description: Sales, persuasion, and messaging skills including Cialdini's influence psychology, Aaron Ross's outbound sales methodology, and Heath Brothers' sticky messaging framework

plugins.name: product-innovation
plugins.description: Product innovation and validation frameworks including Lean Startup methodology, Google Ventures Design Sprint, and Don Norman's design principles

plugins.name: strategy-growth
plugins.description: Business strategy and growth frameworks including Crossing the Chasm tech adoption, Blue Ocean Strategy value innovation, and EOS business operating system

plugins.name: team-motivation
plugins.description: Team motivation and intrinsic drive framework based on Daniel Pink's Autonomy, Mastery, Purpose (AMP) principles
